page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT SURVEY
page.content: We carried out a survey involving occupations of the parents in our school and we placed them into three categories. {Primary Occupations}- such as farming, mining etc. We found that this category is not very important with a total of{43}out of 265 jobs recorded. {Secondary Occupations}- such as manufacturing industries we found this is quite important in our region. This has a total of{74 jobs recorded. {Tertiary Occupations}- such as banking, shopkeeping and transport. We found out that this is the most important category in our region and {154 people came into this group.} We were surprised that there were not more people in the Primary category since this is a mainly farming area.However this shows fewer people {
